title: Kidney Care Goes Digital, More Accessible
itunes:title: Kidney Care Goes Digital, More Accessible
description: Yonatan Adiri is out to revolutionize kidney care – and he’s already doing it. The founder and CEO of Healthy.io explains to Daniel how he’s been able to drive 53% compliance in urine testing among those patients previously noncompliant, across age groups – “The last cohort we did in the UK was 80% of which was above the age of 50. 25% between 71 and 80 years old, where we saw 40% compliance.”  Key to his success is developing technology that’s clinical grade, affordable, and computer-vision-based.
author: CVS Health
itunes:author: CVS Health
